ygData.subject: Re: Question about pets
ygData.msgSnippet: i dont think it affects the strength of your pet (personally i think its random) but i think it does effect your chance of casting it.  in general, ive found
ygData.messageBody:
i dont think it affects the strength of your pet (personally i think its
random) but i think it does effect your chance of casting it. in general,
ive found that the skills determine successful casting of spells, while your
level effects the strength of the spell once cast.

belphenor
lodge of the dead
neriak, fennin ro


>From: Patrickje1@...
>
>Im currently a level 6 gnome necromancer on karana server and Ive got a
>question about pets. Ive heard rumors that your conjuration skill directly
>affects the level of the pet you summon. I was just wondering if there is
>any
>truth to this because Ive found that I summon from level 3-5 and I usually
>get each level the same number of times. Just wondering if conjuration is
>higher will I summon those level 5 skeletons more often or if they can get
>even more powerful.
>
>~Dracor
